src.animations package¶

src.animations.draw_zone module¶

src.animations.screen_constants module¶

Constains constants relating to the screen on whci the animations appear. This includes things like the max \(x\) and \(y\) coordinates. Since \((0,0)\) is at the cetner of the screen, thes are also the negatives of the min \(x\) and \(y\) coordinates.

Authors

  • William Boyles (wmboyles)
